Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at 39th/Morgan
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Morgan, 35th, Ashland and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 39th, Morgan, 35th, Ashland and 39th, due to street blockage near 39th/Morgan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Cicero, Division, Chicago and Austin due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Division, Chicago and Austin, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Irving Park
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
